title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS HEALING / MESMERISM & QUANTUM ALCHEMY
description:
Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates non-verbal hypnosis healing through Mesmerism and Quantum Alchemy. The subject is one of his students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. Dr. Marco Paret is an internationally recognised authority in the fields of Mesmerism, Fascination and Non-verbal hypnosis with over 25 years of experience. The student entered in a deep hypnotic trance state. She woke up strongly liberated and transformed. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
